root.name: Wheels of Destruction
root.description: Wheels of Destruction is a downloadable car combat game that is currently on the PSN (PS3). The game, which is from Gelid Games, takes place in a post apocalyptic world where cars battle to the death using weapons and powerups found around the level. What looks to set this game apart from others is the level of control each vehicle has as you can flip in the air to get strategic advantages.
